text: Q25. | Given that the requested information is not available at local DNS server, a purely iterative DNS query from a requesting host would follow the path: (a) Root server, Authoritative server, TLD server. (b) Root server, TLD server, Authoritative server. (c) Root server, Local server, TLD server, Local server, Authoritative server. (d) Root server, Local server, Authoritative server, Local server, TLD server.
